divs: sighting detailshi, i had just awoken to get a glass of water when i saw this brilliant light outside just east of edmonton ab canada. my ufo experience last sunday morning is on free video at: http:\\www.metacafe.com\watch\851350\ufo_spectacular_over_edmonton\ please feel free to share on your website as well as in newsletters, magazines and radio. it was spectacular! (the incredible thing is that just a few hours before i had been reading stanton coblentz's book the last of the great race about a large purple orb discovered in the arizona desert and now, hours later, is largely a purple orb i have on film! a coincidence? val
Summary: Spectacular UFO over Edmonton AB Canada
